General.Name: Silver Hammer Mining Corp
General.Description: Silver Hammer Mining Corp., a junior resource company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in the United States. Its flagship project is the Silver Strand project that includes 70 claims located in Coeur d'Alene Mining District, Idaho. The company was formerly known as Lakewood Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Silver Hammer Mining Corp. in October 2021. Silver Hammer Mining Corp. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 551 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2C2
